abstract.text: The Light CTL Temperature Range Get is an acknowledged message used to get
the Light CTL Temperature Range state of an Element.
The Light LC Property Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light LC Property state of an Element.
The Light CTL Temperature Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light CTL Temperature state and the Light CTL Delta UV state of an Element.
The base class for unacknowledged messages.
The LC Occupancy Mode Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light LC Occupancy Mode state of an Element.
The Light LC Occupancy Mode Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light LC Occupancy Mode state of an Element.
Light CTL Temperature Get is an acknowledged message used to get the
Light CTL Temperature state of an Element.
Light LC Mode Get is an acknowledged message used to get the
Light LC Mode state of an Element.
A type of a mesh message which opcode is known during compilation time.
Provision, configure and control Bluetooth mesh devices with nRF Mesh library.
Light CTL Temperature Status is an unacknowledged message used to report
the Light CTL Temperature and Light CTL Delta UV state of an Element.
The Light LC Occupancy Mode Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message used to
set the Light LC Occupancy Mode state of an Element.
The Light LC Mode Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light LC Mode state of an Element.
The Light LC Light OnOff Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message
used to set the Light LC Light OnOff state of an Element.
The base class of every mesh message. Mesh messages can be sent to and
received from a mesh network.
Light CTL Temperature Range Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message
used to set the Light CTL Temperature Range state of an Element.
Light CTL Get is an acknowledged message used to get the Light CTL Lightness
state and the Light CTL Temperature state of an Element.
Light LC Light OnOff Get is an acknowledged message used to get the
Light LC State Machine Light OnOff state of an Element.
The Light CTL Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light CTL Lightness and the Light CTL Temperature state of an Element.
The Light LC Property Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light LC Property state of an Element.
The Light CTL Temperature Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message
used to set the Light CTL Temperature state and the Light CTL Delta UV state of an Element.
Light CTL Set is an acknowledged message used to set the Light CTL Lightness state,
Light CTL Temperature state, and the Light CTL Delta UV state of an Element.
The default value of the Light HSL Lightness state.
The Light LC Mode Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message used to set the
Light LC Mode state of an Element.
The base class of every mesh message. Mesh messages can be sent to and
received from the mesh network. For messages with the Op Code known
during compilation a
protocol should be preferred.
The default value of the Light HSL Saturation state.
Light LC Occupancy Mode Get is an acknowledged message used to get the
Light LC Occupancy Mode state of an Element.
The base class for unacknowledged messages with an opcode known at the
compilation time.
Light CTL Temperature Range Status is an unacknowledged message used
to report the Light CTL Temperature Range state of an Element.
The Light LC Mode Set is an acknowledged message used to set the Light LC Mode
state of an Element.
The Light LC Light OnOff Status is an unacknowledged message used to report the
Light LC State Machine Light OnOff state of an Element.
Creates the Light HSL Default Set message.
Light CTL Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message used to set the
Light CTL Lightness state, Light CTL Temperature state, and the Light CTL Delta UV
state of an Element.
Light CTL Temperature Range Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light CTL Temperature Range state of an Element.
The Light LC Property Set Unacknowledged is an unacknowledged message used to
set the Light LC Property state of an Element.
Light LC Property Get is an acknowledged message used to get the Light LC Property
state of an Element.
The Light LC Light OnOff Set is an acknowledged message used to set the
Light LC Light OnOff state of an Element.
The default value of the Light HSL Hue state.
